passages.title: Beginnings
passages.content:
#background:Background1.png
#enemy:gender.png
#player:baby.png
#isFight:false
{E}Hello newborn. Welcome to life. Your first task in life will be to choose what gender you want to be!
{P}Oh no. So scary woOoOooO!

passages.title: Woman
passages.content:
#background:Background1.png
#enemy:gender.png
#player:baby.png
#isFight:true
{E}This was not a wise choice. your life just became 1.89* harder. To be able to life your life. You must defeat me in combat

passages.title: Overgame
passages.content:
#background:Background1.png
#enemy:gender.png
#player:baby.png
#isFight:false
{E}Im sorry. but the world does not currently accept women. Pls try again at a later time.

passages.title: Breast milk
passages.content:
#background:Background1.png
#enemy:milk.png
#player:baby.png
#isFight:false
{N}Congratulations, you were born.
{N}You must choose wether to drink breast milk or not

passages.title: Band
passages.content:
#background:Background1.png
#enemy:peter.png
#player:korpskid.png
#isFight:true
{N}You loose strengh points. Because of this you get bullied at school.
{N}Because of this you are forced to start playing band. Here you meet your one friend Peter. Peter is a lovely guy who loves to play.
{E}I know you have homework, but do you want to play Dungeons & Dragons?

passages.title: Football
passages.content:
#background:Background1.png
#enemy:kids.png
#player:footballkid.png
#isFight:false
{N}You gain strengh points. Because of this you get really popular at school.
{N}You start playing football and get a tonne of friends.
{E}I know you have homework, but do you want to come join us play football?

passages.title: Homework
passages.content:
#background:Background1.png
#enemy:gender.png
#player:baby.png
#isFight:false
{E}The door opens to another room. You see a desk with a large, dusty book.
{P}You are now a fish
